name: Integrated Resale Wholesale Power Market
short_description: The primary goal of this project is the development and implementation of an agent-based test bed for the study of integrated retail and wholesale (IRW) electric power markets operating over transmission and distribution grids with smart-grid functionality. The IRW test bed links together two existing test beds: (i) the AMES Wholesale Power Market Test Bed, developed by a group of researchers at Iowa State University; and (ii) GridLAB-D, an electric energy distribution platform developed by the U.S. Department of Energy at Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
